00028 class Sequence : public virtual Storable {
00029  public:
00030

00033

00035    // Editing
00036    //
00037

00048

00050

00052    virtual void InsertSilence(long_sample_count start, long_sample_count len) = 0;
00053 
00054    virtual void GetWaveDisplay(FloatBuffer& outMin, FloatBuffer& outMax, FloatBuffer& outRMS,
00055                                Int16Buffer& outFlag,
00056                                long_sample_count start, long_sample_count len, int pixelLen,

00058

00104 class SeqBlockNode {
00105  public:
00106    SeqBlockNode(SeqBlock *_block, long_sample_count _start) {
00107       block = _block; start = _start;
00108    }
00109    int len() const { return block->GetLength(); }
00110    long_sample_count end() const { return start + len(); }
00111    Buffer Get() const {
00112       return block->Get(0, len());
00113    }
00114    Buffer Get(long_sample_count start) const {
00115       return block->Get(start, len()-start);
00116    }
00117    Buffer Get(long_sample_count start, int len) const {
00118       return block->Get(start, len);
00119    }
00120    SeqBlock *block;
00121    long_sample_count start;
00122 };
00123 
00124 typedef std::vector<SeqBlockNode> SeqBlockNodeVec;
00125 
00126 #endif
